definitions.definition: A large snowstorm accompanied by strong winds and greatly reduced visibility caused by blowing snow.
A large number of similar things; especially, such a group arriving as an inundation , thick and fast .

main_definition: A large snowstorm accompanied by strong winds and greatly reduced visibility caused by blowing snow.
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively ) A large amount of paperwork .
( figuratively ) A large number of similar things; especially, such a group arriving as an inundation , thick and fast .
